name: Member Counts Go App
description: A Go application that periodically retrieves, processes, and sends member counts to a Google Chat Webhook.

REDASH_BASE_URL.description: The base URL of your Redash instance.

REDASH_API_KEY.description: The API key for accessing the Redash API.

REDASH_QUERY_ID.description: The ID of the Redash query to fetch.

GOOGLE_CHAT_WEBHOOK_URL.description: The URL of the Google Chat Webhook.

SCHEDULE_HOUR.description: The hour to trigger the action.

SCHEDULE_MINUTE.description: The minute to trigger the action.
